name: DENSE MESH!
description:
[How to play]

click the point where you want to go.

[Rule ]

You can make a mesh when you click the vertexes of the square. Make meshes as many as possible  until the life becomes 0. The life is added to the score If you complete all meshes.

! It takes many life to click a far point from the current point.

! If you touch the bee, it's game over.

! The life completely recover if you touch the heart.
